resources.string: Your Android platform is not supported. Please get in touch with us to provide us more information about your device so we can support it in future.
Wrong arguments were supplied! Please, check the sdr_tcp manual!
Invalid USB file descriptor passed via Java.
No compatible devices found (make sure your USB device is connected, properly powered and your phone/tablet supports USB host mode).
Device was found but cannot be open. This may indicate that your phone/tablet does not support USB OTG
Your Android device does not provide enough power to the dongle. You must use an externally powered USB hub or an externally powered USB OTG cable.
